Header: Four faculties of the Rajarata University temporarily shut down
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st):- Four faculties of the Rajarata University in Mihintale have been temporarily shut down due to a flu that is spreading through the campus. Acting Vice-Chancellor of the university, A. M. J. B. Adhikari says thatÂ the decision was taken following the sudden death of a student in the science faculty.
